code: @Override protected void addPersistenceExceptionTranslation(ProxyFactory pf, PersistenceExceptionTranslator pet) {     if (AnnotationUtils.findAnnotation(pf.getTargetClass(), Repository.class) != null) {         DefaultListableBeanFactory bf = new DefaultListableBeanFactory().         bf.registerBeanDefinition("peti", new RootBeanDefinition(PersistenceExceptionTranslationInterceptor.class)).         bf.registerSingleton("pet", pet).         pf.addAdvice((PersistenceExceptionTranslationInterceptor) bf.getBean("peti")).     } }
